articles.title: Rupee May Hit 74 Per Dollar By End Of December, Say Experts - NDTV Profit
articles.description: A potential gush of foreign inflows on the back of a slew of large share sales is likely to bring reprieve to the Indian rupee, pummeled by rising oil prices.
articles.content:
Indian rupee may gain about 2% from Wednesdays close to 74 per dollar by the end of December.

articles.author: Ben Winck, Andy Kiersz
articles.title: The energy market is a mess right now. It could make inflation worse - Business Insider
articles.description: From China to the EU, the world's energy supply is crippled. That's showing up in everything from higher gas prices to massive shipping delays.
articles.content: You're paying $3.29 per gallon to fill your car when it cost $2.29 at the start of the year. Your online orders are arriving way later than usual. And as winter nears, it's costing more to heat your … [+4534 chars]
